name: Ancient Code VR( The Fantasy Egypt Journey)
description: Ancient Code is an innovation game from indie game developer studio Edougames and it includes 4 high-quality mini games which are called Grenadier, Archery,Shooting and Mix level design. Please join in and start the Fantasy Journey of Egypt!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 64bit Processor: FX 8300 / i5 4460 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 / R9 380 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows10 64bit Processor: Ryzen 1600 / i7 6700 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: RX 480/ GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
